mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cs_lease_returns (process_user_id, process_user_name, status, terminal_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, order_types, contact, phone, return_address_id, customer_id, cs_cencel_id) values (#{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csCencelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cs_lease_returns set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_types = #{orderTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_address_id = #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cs_cencel_id = #{csCencelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, terminal_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, order_types, contact, phone, return_address_id, customer_id, cs_cencel_id from cs_lease_returns where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, terminal_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, order_types, contact, phone, return_address_id, customer_id, cs_cencel_id from cs_lease_returns
mapper.sql: select cl.*, t.id t_id, t.serial_num t_serial_num, m.id m_id, m.title m_title, m.phone m_phone, pc.id pc_id, pc.name pc_name, g.id g_id, g.title g_title, g.lease_price g_lease_price, g.lease_time g_lease_time, g.return_time g_return_time, g.lease_deposit g_lease_deposit, o.id o_id, o.updated_at o_updated_at, addr.id addr_id, addr.address addr_address, addr.phone addr_phone, addr.receiver addr_receiver from cs_lease_returns cl left join terminals t on cl.terminal_id=t.id left join goods g on t.good_id=g.id left join orders o on t.order_id=o.id left join pay_channels pc on pc.id=t.pay_channel_id left join merchants m on m.id=t.merchant_id left join cs_receiver_addresses addr on addr.id=cl.return_address_id
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM cs_lease_returns cl
order by cl.process_user_id = #{customerId} desc, cl.created_at desc limit #{pageRequest.offset}, #{pageRequest.pageSize}
mapper.update: update cs_lease_returns set process_user_id = #{customerId}, process_user_name = #{customerName} where id in #{item}
